name: ChunkEvent.Load
description: ChunkEvent.Load is fired when vanilla Minecraft attempts to load a Chunk into the level. This event is fired during chunk loading in Chunk.onChunkLoad(). Note: This event may be called before the underlying LevelChunk is promoted to ChunkStatus.FULL . You will cause chunk loading deadlocks if you don't delay your level interactions. This event is not invalid reference ICancellableEvent . This event does not have a result. invalid reference HasResult This event is fired on the NeoForge.EVENT_BUS .

methods.name: isNewChunk
methods.description: Check whether the Chunk is newly generated, and being loaded for the first time. Will only ever return true on the logical server.
